amendment.description: To make available $80,000,000 for coproduction of the Arrow ballistic missile defense system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2453 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2453 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12507) To make available $80,000,000 for coproduction of the Arrow ballistic missile defense system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2453 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2453 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
